review: We love this little gadget!  Prior to getting the Amazon Fire TV we'd been using the internet service on our Sony Blue Ray player.  It was always balky, slow, and offered very little in the way of content that we cared about.  We went to Best Buy on a whim and picked up the Fire TV since we already had an Amazon Prime account.  Set up was a breeze and we were on the web within minutes watching movies and trying out the features.  The downloads and performance are fast and our movies are not interrupted any more with buffering and delays.  We're definitely impressed.One thing we really like is the speech recognition from the remote, although my wife ran into a funny experience when searching for movie titles.  My kids told her to search for "space action" and the Fire TV came up with "beef action".  We got a great laugh out of that - and from now on we're more careful when using the speech recognition feature.
